locations.name: Assam State Overview
locations.description: Assam has witnessed systematic evictions displacing over 20,000 families since 2021.

locations.name: Darrang District
locations.description: Site of the Dhalpur evictions where Moinul Haque and Sheikh Farid were killed by police firing on September 23, 2021.

locations.name: Goalpara District
locations.description: 3,067 families evicted. Most recent incident on July 12, 2025 during forest clearance left one dead.
